name: Overlay4WP
author: bolo

sections.description:
Features:
1. In addition to the jQuery library, only need to load some little JS files and some little of CSS files.
2. The output code of the plug-in on the page in line with W3C’s XHTML 1.1 and CSS 3 standards, and the code structure is very simple.
3. When deactivated，the images calling code generated by the plug-in will not cause any adverse effects.

This plugin allows you easily to make Overlay gallery popups on WordPress.

这个插件助你在 WordPress 中轻易地使用 Overlay gallery 相册功能。

Supported Languages:

  • US English/en_US (default)
  • 简体中文/zh_CN (translate by bolo)
sections.installation:
1. Unzip archive to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
    解压文件到“/wp-content/plugins/”目录。
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
    在WordPress后台“插件”页面激活Overlay4WP。

■Custom style:
自定义样式：
Create a CSS file named “overlay4wp.css” under current theme directory.
在当前主题目录建立名为“overlay4wp.css”的样式表文件。
sections.changelog:
VERSION DATE       TYPE   CHANGES
1.0.3     2009/11/19  NEW   Custom background colour.
1.0.2     2009/11/2  FIX   Enhance compatibility.
                                 NEW   Optimize overlay4wp.css.
1.0.1     2009/11/1 FIX    Repair some BUG.
                   NEW    Custom your own style by CSS.
1.0     2009/10/31 NEW    Support overlay gallery.
                   NEW    Works for TinyMCE.
                   NEW    Powered by tools.overlay 1.1.2.

short_description: Easy to use Overlay popus gallery in WordPress.Base on jQuery Library.
description:
Features:
1. In addition to the jQuery library, only need to load some little JS files and some little of CSS files.
2. The output code of the plug-in on the page in line with W3C’s XHTML 1.1 and CSS 3 standards, and the code structure is very simple.
3. When deactivated，the images calling code generated by the plug-in will not cause any adverse effects.

This plugin allows you easily to make Overlay gallery popups on WordPress.

这个插件助你在 WordPress 中轻易地使用 Overlay gallery 相册功能。

Supported Languages:

  • US English/en_US (default)

screenshots.caption:
Insert a image overlay effect when writting article.
  在写文章时插入图片overlay效果。
